properties.name: mywild.app.name
properties.description: The application name from Maven.

properties.name: mywild.app.version
properties.description: The application version from Maven.

properties.name: mywild.app.dev-mode
properties.description: Whether the server is in development mode or not (dev-mode will show additional logs, etc.).

properties.name: mywild.jwt.audience
properties.description: The JWT token audience (aud) claim.

properties.name: mywild.jwt.subject
properties.description: The JWT token subject (sub) claim.

properties.name: mywild.jwt.issuer
properties.description: The JWT token issuer (iss) claim.

properties.name: mywild.jwt.access-token-duration
properties.description: The number of minutes the JWT access token is valid for.

properties.name: mywild.jwt.refresh-token-duration
properties.description: The number of minutes the JWT refresh token is valid for.

properties.name: mywild.jwt.key.private
properties.description: The private key used by the JWT token.

properties.name: mywild.jwt.key.public
properties.description: The public key used by the JWT token.

properties.name: mywild.cors
properties.description: The CORS allowed origins.

properties.name: mywild.api-path
properties.description: The base URL path for the API.

properties.name: mywild.rate.concurrent-users-limit
properties.description: The number of active users per 5 minutes to allow before replying with HTTP Code 429.

properties.name: mywild.rate.user-rate-limit
properties.description: The number of requests per User that can be processed per 5 minutes before replying with HTTP Code 429.

properties.name: mywild.rate.global-rate-limit
properties.description: The number of requests from all Users that can be processed per 5 minutes before replying with HTTP Code 429.

properties.name: mywild.csv.folder
properties.description: The path to the root folder containing all of the Ambient Weather CSV files to process.

properties.name: mywild.ambient-weather.app-key
properties.description: The Ambient Weather APP Key.

properties.name: mywild.ambient-weather.api-key
properties.description: The Ambient Weather API Key.

properties.name: mywild.weather-underground.api-key
properties.description: The Weather Underground API Key.

properties.name: mywild.my-stations
properties.description: The names of the weather stations owned by myself.
